players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
Bob: "I'm as shocked as you are, Alice. Let's all share any observations carefully to uncover the truth."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town!"
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso, as I investigated her last night. We must vote her out immediately to protect the town!"
You: "Diana, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. Why should we believe you're the detective and not the mafia trying to frame an innocent person?"
Bob: "Diana's claim is bold, but as the detective, it's our best lead. I suggest we vote for Alice to eliminate the threat."
